Author: nocares1
Text: Here are a list of actions I have been doing that I have somehow completely ignored in the fantasy "it's all fine":  - Waking up at midnight each day to 'walk' on the spot to get 10 - 15k steps - waking up again at 5:30 to get to work (which includes an hour walk) or go for a 4 hour walk - Walk while of lunch and every hour for at least 10 mins - Occasionally walk home - 4 hours each way - Binge - Attempt to restrict and fail - Get angry at people (how outward depends on who) if they ask me to eat or in anyway control my intake - Avoid social scenarios unless it's on my own terms but even then be pissed off - If I am out, j will either leave early or stay past midnight so can walk back home and get my long daily walk out the way so can exercise after at home  Oh there's so many more I am actually tearing up just thinking how much an idiot I am.  And I just realised why I thought I was relatively OK: I stopped activly calorie counting
